channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wearables
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wearables

item.title: CVE-2019-10492|2024-08-04T22:24:18.508Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wearables
item.description: Boot image not getting verified by AVB in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wearables in MDM9607, MSM8909W, Qualcomm 215, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 427, SD 430, SD 435, SD 439 / SD 429, SD 450, SD 625, SD 632, SD 820, SD 820A, SDM439

item.title: CVE-2019-10531|2024-08-04T22:24:18.575Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wearables
item.description: Incorrect reading of system image resulting in buffer overflow when size of system image is increased in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wearables in MDM9607, MSM8909W, Qualcomm 215, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 439 / SD 429, SD 450, SD 625, SD 632, SDM439
